row1.title: A private, enterprise social network
row1.line1: Update your status to inform your co-workers
row1.line2: Subscribe to other employees' time lines
row1.line3: Share important information to your followers
row1.line4: Discuss and reply to your colleagues
row1.line6: Search useful information with our integrated search engine
row1.line7: Use hashtags to find related information
row1.line8: Go to your co-workers' profiles to see what they are working on
row1.line9: English and French versions available, adding other languages is easy

row2.title: Works on all devices!
row2.line1: Dynamic web application (HTML5): nothing to install, except a modern browser!
row2.line2: Works on mobile devices, tablets, or standard computers: the application adapts itself automatically to your device's screen
row2.line3: Stay connected with your enterprise wherever you are

row3.title: Easy installation and integration with your company's IT infrastructure
row3.line2: Your data belongs to you, not to your SaaS vendor!
row3.line5: Fully Open Source, with a business-friendly Apache 2.0 license
row3.line6: Easy to extend or modify according to your needs
row3.line7: High performance (based on Apache Cassandra), even on small hardware
row3.line8: Join the project and submit patches on our Github page:

row4.title: Also available in SaaS mode, fully managed by Ippon Technologies
row4.line1: If you do not want to install Tatami in your company, it's easy to use directly
row4.line2: Secured multi-enterprise mode: every company has its own private space
row4.line3: 256 bits SSL encryption: all data transfers are fully secured
